    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AlertService
    Service for displaying alert dialogs in the TheKnife application.
    DistanceCalculator
    Utility class for calculating geographical distances between locations.
    HomeController
    Controller for the home screen of the TheKnife application.
    Launcher
    JavaFX application launcher for the TheKnife application.
    LoginController
    Controller for the login screen of the TheKnife application.
    Main
    Main entry point for the TheKnife application.
    RegisterController
    Controller for the registration screen of the TheKnife application.
    Restaurant
    Represents a restaurant in the TheKnife application.
    Restaurant.Coordinate
    Represents geographical coordinates for a restaurant location.
    RestaurantController
    Controller for the restaurant detail screen of the TheKnife application.
    RestaurantRepository
    Repository for managing restaurant data in the TheKnife application.
    RestaurantRepository.ERROR_CODE
    Enumeration of possible error codes returned by repository operations.
    Review
    Represents a review for a restaurant in the TheKnife application.
    ReviewsRepository
    Repository for managing review data in the TheKnife application.
    ReviewsRepository.ERROR_CODE
    Enumeration of possible error codes returned by repository operations.
    Role
    Represents the roles that users can have in the TheKnife application.
    SecurityService
    Service for handling security-related operations in the TheKnife application.
    SessionService
    Service for managing application session state in the TheKnife application.
    User
    Represents a user in the TheKnife application.
    UserRepository
    Repository for managing user data in the TheKnife application.
    UserRepository.ERROR_CODE
    Enumeration of possible error codes returned by repository operations.
